abilities.desc: At the start and end of your turn, you gain Shield 2.
After your Shield absorbs from an enemy Action, you deal 1 damage to them. If it broke your Shield, you deal 2 damage instead.

actions.name: Blossoms
actions.desc:
You gain Shield 2 and choose one: Gain 1 Power token; -or- Move 1; -or- heal 1.
6+: Instead, gain Shield 4 and choose two.

actions.name: Brambles
actions.desc:
Deal 1 damage to up to X enemies within Range 1-X, then gain 1 Power token. X is equal to the value of the destroyed Shield.
Usable twice per turn.
